channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP CRM WebClient UI (SAPSCORE)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP CRM WebClient UI (SAPSCORE)

item.title: CVE-2019-0245|2024-08-04T17:44:15.952Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20crm%20webclient%20ui%20%28sapscore%29
item.description: SAP CRM WebClient UI (fixed in SAPSCORE 1.12; S4FND 1.02; WEBCUIF 7.31, 7.46, 7.47, 7.48, 8.0, 8.01) does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2019-0244|2024-08-04T17:44:16.026Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20crm%20webclient%20ui%20%28sapscore%29
item.description: SAP CRM WebClient UI (fixed in SAPSCORE 1.12; S4FND 1.02; WEBCUIF 7.31, 7.46, 7.47, 7.48, 8.0, 8.01) does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
